Class PebbleUiController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apps8os.trafficsense.pebble.PebbleUiController

  • public class PebbleUiController
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for Pebble user interface controller.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update()
        Call this whenever anything needs to be updated in Pebble

      • totalUpdate

        public void totalUpdate()
        Updates everything in Pebble

      • getFirstNonWalkingSegmentIndex

        private int getFirstNonWalkingSegmentIndex(int currentIndex)
        Gets the index of the first non-walking segment in the route starting from index currentIndex. Returns -1 if not found or with -1 as input.

      • alarmIfNeeded

        private void alarmIfNeeded()
        Send an alarm if we are on the second last stop

      • initializeSegment

        private void initializeSegment(int segmentIndex)
        Initializes segment-related values on Pebble. This includes the stops that need to be shown initially. Also shows the screen that tells how many minutes until the vehicles comes. Should be only used when we are at the first waypoint of a non-walking segment.

      • updateList

        private void updateList(Segment segment)
        Updates all stops shown in the 3stop list

      • addWpToList

        private void addWpToList()
        Scrolls PebbleUI one stop forward

      • alarmGetOff

        private void alarmGetOff()
        Triggers a 'Get off' alarm on Pebble.
